item.title: US Stock Cryptocurrency Concept Stock Pre-market Drop, Strategy Down Nearly 2%
item.description: On August 18th, based on the market data from Rockflow, with Bitcoin declining intraday, US stock cryptocurrency concept stocks saw a fall in pre-market trading. Strategy (MSTR.O) dropped by nearly 2%, Coinbase (COIN.O), and Riot Platforms both dropped by more than 1%.

item.title: The South Korean Financial Regulatory Authority is set to submit a stablecoin regulation bill in October.
item.description: August 18th - As per The Block, it is anticipated that the Financial Services Commission (FSC) of South Korea will present a stablecoin regulation bill to the National Assembly in October. A ruling party member in South Korea, Park Min-gue, mentioned on Monday during a stablecoin-related discussion that he has received a report from the FSC outlining this plan.This bill will mandate regulations regarding stablecoin issuance, collateral management, and internal risk control systems, and it is expected to be incorporated into the ongoing formulation of the second set of digital asset legal frameworks.

item.title: If Bitcoin drops below $113,000, the mainstream CEX's total long liquidation amount will reach $984 million
item.description: On August 18th, according to Coinglass data, in the event that Bitcoin drops below $113,000, the cumulative liquidation intensity of mainstream CEXs will amount to $984 million.On the other hand, if Bitcoin rises above $117,000, the cumulative liquidation intensity of mainstream CEXs will reach $688 million.BlockBeats Notes: The liquidation chart does not precisely depict the number of contracts awaiting liquidation or the exact value of contracts being liquidated. The bars on the liquidation chart actually represent the significance of each liquidation cluster in relation to adjacent liquidation clusters, that is, the intensity.Consequently, the liquidation chart shows to what degree the price of the underlying asset will be influenced when it attains a certain level. A higher "liquidation bar" indicates that once the price reaches that level, it will undergo a more intense reaction due to a liquidity cascade.

item.title: Binance to Support Fusionist (ACE) Network Upgrade and Hard Fork
item.description: August 18th. As per an official communication, Binance is slated to halt the token deposit and withdrawal services of the Fusionist (ACE) network on August 20th, 2025, at 13:00 (GMT+8) in order to facilitate its network upgrade and hard fork.The project team will carry out the network upgrade and hard fork at block height 3,828,237 (anticipated to be at 14:00 on August 20th, 2025, GMT+8).

item.title: Shitcoin Follows Market Downtrend, RAY Plunges Over 9% in 24 Hours
item.description: On August 18th, according to HTX market data, with Bitcoin falling below $115,000 today, altcoins generally experienced a decline. Specifically:RAY is currently trading at $3.336, showing a 24-hour loss of 9.78%;LPT is currently trading at $6.375, with a 24-hour loss of 9.21%;SCRT is currently trading at $0.1808, having a 24-hour loss of 8.83%.

item.title: ChatGPT Mobile App Generates $2 Billion in Revenue
item.description: On August 18th, based on the latest analysis by the app intelligence provider Appfigures, since its launch in May 2023, the iOS and Android apps of ChatGPT have generated a global revenue of $2 billion. The analysis indicates that this figure is approximately 30 times the total revenue of ChatGPT's competitors on mobile devices, including Claude, Copilot, and Grok.The data shows that so far this year, the mobile apps of ChatGPT have achieved a revenue of $1.35 billion, representing a year-over-year growth of 673% compared to the same period in 2024 (January to July), which was $174 million. The average monthly revenue of the app is close to $193 million, up from $25 million last year. (Jin10)

item.title: Binance will list CYBER/USDC, MAV/USDC, and SKL/USDC spot trading pairs
item.description: August 18th. According to an official announcement, Binance announced that it will list the CYBER/USDC, MAV/USDC, and SKL/USDC spot trading pairs on August 19th, 2025, at 4:00 PM (UTC+8).In addition, Binance will provide trading bot services for the following trading pairs starting on August 19th, 2025, at 4:00 PM (UTC+8).Spot Algo Orders: CYBER/USDC, MAV/USDC, and SKL/USDC.

item.title: Bybit WSOT 2025's first Traderâ€™s Camp livestream kicks off today, with a total prize pool of 10 million USDT.
item.description: On August 18th, the cryptocurrency exchange platform Bybit announced that the annual trading extravaganza World Series of Trading (WSOT) 2025 has officially begun, with a huge prize pool reaching up to 10 million USDT. The first Trader's Camp live event will commence today at 8:00 AM UTC.The live lineup consists of renowned traders and KOLs such as Chart Champions, David Tech, Dusty BC, Crypto Rover, and Forfiles, who will share exclusive strategies and interact with participants. During the live broadcast, viewers will also get the chance to share a 10,000 USDT reward.As the highlight of the WSOT 2025 ten-day prelude event, this series of activities will include leaderboard sprints, mystery box missions, and a total of 20,000 USDT in cryptocurrency learning course challenges. Live broadcast benefits involve a sneak peek at new features, a 5,000 USDT airdrop, and iPhone 16 Pro Max and other luxury gifts.

item.title: Matrixport: Bitcoin to Revisit $112,000 or Lower, Market Awaits Fed FOMC Meeting as Key Catalyst
item.description: On August 18th, Matrixport issued a new report indicating that Bitcoin was unable to hold the downtrend line. This initially signaled a breakout but recently dropped below the former support. Although not overly worried about further downside risks, due to the market remaining cautious ahead of the September Fed rate decision, the Bitcoin price may once again test the $112,000 level.Matrixport does not anticipate that this year's Jackson Hole meeting will release any significant signals as it is more of a discussion platform rather than a market driver. Currently, the market is awaiting a real catalyst, with the September 17th FOMC meeting being the most crucial event.Technically, Bitcoin is currently in a "no man's land" between $112,000 and $117,292. This leaves traders with two distinct strategies: buying on a breakout above the range or accumulating on a pullback near $112,000. In other words, the market is in a period of observation, waiting for a clear direction.

item.title: Dutch crypto service provider Amdax establishes Bitcoin Treasury company AMBTS, aiming to hold 210,000 BTC
item.description: On August 18th, according to @btcNLNico, the Dutch cryptocurrency service provider Amdax has set in motion the establishment of AMBTS B.V. (referred to as "AMBTS"). It is planned to list as a Bitcoin treasury company on the pan-European securities trading platform Amsterdam Market. The long-term goal of AMBTS is to gradually transform into a treasury company holding 1% of the global Bitcoin.
